long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes we need to take a break from some of the news - but not all of the news.

News Blockade will remove chunks of any website based on a list of "stop words" that you want to take a break from. The stop words are completely customizable, but we also supply a set of predefined stop word lists that you can choose from:

- Politics (All)
- Democratic Politics
- Republican Politics
- Supreme Court
- Abortion
- Gun Violence
- Climate Change
- War

News Blockade defaults to "no filtering." You can filter by opening the extension, opting to filter that website and choosing your stop words.

News Blockade will work on any website, including Google News, NY Times, Washington Post, etc. It even works on Facebook. And you can toggle the filtering on-and-off per website.

(It will also work while in Incognito mode, but you need to select that choice in the Extensions - Manage Extension option.)
